byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Hackers who infiltrated the Nasdaq stock market's computer systems installed spyware that snooped on the boards of several public companies, according to Reuters.
snippet: Hackers who infiltrated the Nasdaq stock market's computer systems installed spyware that snooped on the boards of several public companies, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Nasdaq Hackers Said to Spy on Corporate Boards
